Package mpmToolbox.gui.mpmEditingTools

Class MpmEditingTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • mpmToolbox.gui.mpmEditingTools.MpmEditingTools
  • public class MpmEditingTools
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for MpmTreeNode. It generates the context menu that appears when right clicking in the MPM tree and all functionality required for it.
    Author:
    Axel Berndt

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      MpmEditingTools()

      • quickOpenEditor

        public static void quickOpenEditor​(@NotNull
                                   MpmTreeNode forThisNode,
                                   @NotNull
                                   MpmTree inThisMpmTree)
        Invoke this method to immediately open the editor dialog of MPM nodes ... at least those that have an editor dialog and are leaf nodes in the MPM tree. Non-leaf nodes expand on double click and that is what this method is meant to be used for, open the editor on double click.
        Parameters:
        forThisNode -
        inThisMpmTree -

      • updateAudioAlignment

        protected static boolean updateAudioAlignment​(meico.mpm.elements.Performance performance,
                                              ProjectPane projectPane,
                                              boolean updateTempomapPanel)
        changes in the performance should also be visible in the alignment that is currently shown in the audio frame
        Parameters:
        performance - the performance where the changes were made
        projectPane - the project pane from which we get access to all other components, particularly the SyncPlayer and the audio frame/AudioDocumentData object
        updateTempomapPanel - set true if timing was affected and the tempomap panel in the audio tab might be updated
        Returns:
        true if the currently displayed alignment in the audio frame has been updated, otherwise false

      • setDetuneUnite

        private static void setDetuneUnite​(@NotNull
                                   java.lang.String unit,
                                   @NotNull
                                   MpmTreeNode imprecisionMapTuningNode,
                                   @NotNull
                                   MpmTree mpmTree)
        set the detune unit of a tuning imprecision map
        Parameters:
        unit -

        mpmTree -

      • handOverScorePosition

        private static void handOverScorePosition​(nu.xom.Element prevMapElement,
                                          nu.xom.Element newMapElement,
                                          Score score)
        This is a helper function. If the old map entry is linked in the score, we have to associate the new now with that score position.
        Parameters:
        prevMapElement - the old map entry
        newMapElement - the new map entry
        score - the score data
